content:
NodeHealthEvaluation Class

Definition

Represents health evaluation for a node, containing information about the data and the algorithm used by health store to evaluate health. The evaluation is returned only when the aggregated health state is either Error or Warning.

In this Article

public sealed class NodeHealthEvaluation : System.Fabric.Health.HealthEvaluation
Inheritance
Object
HealthEvaluation
NodeHealthEvaluation

Inherited Members

AggregatedHealthState
Description
Kind
ToString()

Properties

NodeName

Gets the node name.
UnhealthyEvaluations

Gets the unhealthy evaluations that led to the current aggregated health state of the node. The types of the unhealthy evaluations can be EventHealthEvaluation.
